workshoptitle: Predicting Auto Claim Fraud with Oracle Machine Learning

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Provision ADB
tutorials.description: Explore Zeppelin notebooks and create a ML model on customer credit data set.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Create Machine Learning Model
tutorials.description: Explore Zeppelin notebooks and create a ML model on customer credit data set.

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Using Prediction in an Application
tutorials.description: Set up the ATP environment, import and APEX application and explore how ADB can be embedded into applications.

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
